    • Uses of StatsStorage in org.deeplearning4j.ui.api

      Methods in org.deeplearning4j.ui.api that return types with arguments of type StatsStorage 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract List<StatsStorage> UIServer.getStatsStorageInstances() 
      Methods in org.deeplearning4j.ui.api with parameters of type StatsStorage 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract void UIServer.attach(StatsStorage statsStorage)
      Attach the given StatsStorage instance to the UI, so the data can be visualized
      abstract void UIServer.detach(StatsStorage statsStorage)
      Detach the specified StatsStorage instance from the UI
      abstract boolean UIServer.isAttached(StatsStorage statsStorage)
      Check whether the specified StatsStorage instance is attached to the UI instance
      void UIModule.onAttach(StatsStorage statsStorage)
      Notify the UI module that the given StatsStorage instance has been attached to the UI
      void UIModule.onDetach(StatsStorage statsStorage)
      Notify the UI module that the given StatsStorage instance has been detached from the UI

    • Uses of StatsStorage in org.deeplearning4j.ui.storage

      Classes in org.deeplearning4j.ui.storage that implement StatsStorage 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BaseCollectionStatsStorage
      An implementation of the StatsStorage interface, backed by MapDB
      class  FileStatsStorage
      A StatsStorage implementation that stores UI data in a file for persistence.
      Can be used for multiple instances, and across multiple independent runs.
      class  InMemoryStatsStorage
      A StatsStorage implementation that stores all data in memory.

    • Uses of StatsStorage in org.deeplearning4j.ui.storage.mapdb

      Classes in org.deeplearning4j.ui.storage.mapdb that implement StatsStorage 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  MapDBStatsStorage
      An implementation of the StatsStorage interface, backed by MapDB (in-memory or file).
      See also InMemoryStatsStorage and FileStatsStorage

    • Uses of StatsStorage in org.deeplearning4j.ui.storage.sqlite

      Classes in org.deeplearning4j.ui.storage.sqlite that implement StatsStorage 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  J7FileStatsStorage
      A Java 7 compatible file-based StatsStorage implementation, based on SQLite.
